metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3363 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An information disclosure issue in Gitlab CE/EE affecting all versions from 13.6 prior to 15.11.10, all versions from 16.0 prior to 16.0.6, all versions from 16.1 prior to 16.1.1, resulted in the Sidekiq log including webhook tokens when the log format was set to `default`.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
